bookmark.title: CNN
bookmark.desc: Breaking News, U.S., World, Weather , and Entertainment News

bookmark.title: MSNBC
bookmark.desc: MSNBC is an American basic cable and satellite channel that provides news coverage and political opinion on current events. It is owned by the NBCUniversal News Group, a unit of the NBCUniversal Television Group division of NBCUniversal.

bookmark.title: Al Jazeera America
bookmark.desc: Al Jazeera America offers unbiased, fact-based, in-depth stories of U.S. and international news, including sports, business, lifestyle and investigative journalism.

bookmark.title: Hot Jalapeno Crab Dip
bookmark.desc: Recipe from Everyday Is A Party Cookbook, by Emeril Lagasse, with Marcelle Bienvenu and Felicia Willett, published by William Morrow, 1999

bookmark.title: Pan-Seared Rib Eye
bookmark.desc: Rib Eye Recipe Courtesy of Alton Brown

bookmark.title: Quinoa Salad
bookmark.desc: Quinoa, a "new" ingredient that has been around for thousands of years, is a tiny, high-protein grain from South America. It's nicknamed the "wonder grain" because it cooks more quickly than rice, is virtually foolproof, and is lighter and more nutritious than other grains.

bookmark.title: Eggplant Parmigiana
bookmark.desc: Eggplant Recipe courtest of Mario Batali

bookmark.title: HTML Validator
bookmark.desc: Always remember to visit the W3C website to validate your markup

bookmark.title: CSS Validator
bookmark.desc: Always remember to visit the W3C website to validate your CSS

bookmark.title: jQueryUI
bookmark.desc: jQuery UI is a curated set of user interface interactions, effects, widgets, and themes built on top of the jQuery JavaScript Library. Whether you're building highly interactive web applications or you just need to add a date picker to a form control, jQuery UI is the perfect choice.

bookmark.title: jQuery
bookmark.desc: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers. With a combination of versatility and extensibility, jQuery has changed the way that millions of people write JavaScript.
